name: CBAttributePermissions
desc: Values that represent the read, write, and encryption permissions for a characteristic’s value.

items.name: init(rawValue: UInt)
items.desc: Creates a permissions instance from the provided raw value.

items.name: static var readable: CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: A permission that indicates a peripheral can read the attribute’s value.

items.name: static var writeable: CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: A permission that indicates a peripheral can write the attribute’s value.

items.name: static var readEncryptionRequired: CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: A permission that indicates only trusted devices can read the attribute’s value.

items.name: static var writeEncryptionRequired: CBAttributePermissions
items.desc: A permission that indicates only trusted devices can write the attribute’s value.
